data.route_analysis: Flights to Guatemala typically connect through major U.S. cities. Traffic is moderate in autumn. Local transport includes buses and shuttles.
data.seasonal_patterns: High season from November to April. Autumn offers fewer tourists and mild weather.
data.climate: Temperatures range from 20°C to 25°C (68°F to 77°F). Mild and dry conditions ideal for exploration.
data.culture: Cultural festivals celebrate indigenous heritage, especially during the Day of the Dead in early November.
data.attractions: Key sites include Tikal National Park, Lake Atitlán, and the colonial charm of Antigua.
